name: DefconPlusPlus
author: FlapJack & DebuggerDan
short: Implement the DEFCON scale on your server, but Phi Sigma United specific!
description:
Creates embeds in response to Academic DEFCON level changes. This cog is purely cosmetic. No server settings are altered.

Dependencies: None
install_msg: Thanks for installing DEFCON. Remember... sometimes the only winning move is not to procrastinate!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
